pinyin: quan2 qiu2 wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

definition: global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan

sentences.english: Gillett and Hicks hired Barclays Capital to put out feelers internationally to find a buyer.
sentences.chinese: 吉列特和希克斯委托巴克莱帮助他们全球寻找买主。

sentences.english: Powdery mildew is a global disease for the cereal crop.
sentences.chinese: 白粉病是禾谷类作物的全球性病害。

sentences.english: Most global transactions are carried out by a letter of credit (LC).
sentences.chinese: 大多数全球交易都是通过信用证白勺方式完成。

sentences.english: Steven Kennard:What are the requirements for ABP choosing international partners?
sentences.chinese: 总部基地在全球选择合作伙伴都有哪些要求？

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球变暖影响，青藏高原气候呈现出暖干趋势。

sentences.english: The insurance industry is one of the fastest developing industries in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 保险行业是全球经济中发展最快的行业之一。

sentences.english: Its global temperature records stretch back to 1850.
sentences.chinese: 该机构的全球温度记录始于1850年。

sentences.english: But investment in global health is in the national interest too, " Varmus told The Times.
sentences.chinese: 而且投资全球卫生也是国家利益的一部分。

sentences.english: And all of this, of course, ignores the benefits of limiting global warming.
sentences.chinese: 而所有这一切都忽略了遏制全球变暖所带来的好处。

sentences.english: Driven by the new technology revolution, economic globalization has picked up speed.
sentences.chinese: 在新技术革命的推动下，经济全球化进程加快。

sentences.english: Globalization will not self-regulate in ways that ensure fair distribution of benefits.
sentences.chinese: 全球化不会自我调节，确保公平分配利益。

sentences.english: Finally, to seek a corresponding point of the audiences from home and abroad under the globalizational context.
sentences.chinese: 在全球化语境下，寻求中外观众审美需求的契合点。

sentences.english: From this viewpoint, globalisation is a kind of phenomenological tool for making sense of the world.
sentences.chinese: 从这个观点看，全球化是个认识世界现象的逻辑工具。

sentences.english: The global recession has hit Kumi's hometown hard.
sentences.chinese: 全球的经济衰退给木村的家乡造成了很大的冲击。

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均气温纪录对认识气候变化的过程至关重要。

sentences.english: The Slow Year Movement is becoming increasingly popular.
sentences.chinese: “慢活运动”正在全球吸引越来越多的参与者。

definition: Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
domestic and international/at home and abroad
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
